column1: San Miguel el Alto is a town and municipality
column2: in Jalisco in central-western Mexico. The municipality covers an area of 580 km².
the municipality had a total population of 40
column3: 000.The municipality includes the town of San José de los Reynoso.

column2: Los chiflados del rock and roll

column1: San Miguel is known for its beautiful patronal festival that lasts from 19 September to 29 September. The celebration is in honor of Saint Michael the Arch Angel. Many events like horse races
column4: and the coronation of the fiesta queen take place.

column1: La belleza eterna de San Miguel el Alto
